name: Gatito War
description:
Greetings!

This game was originally made for web during the summer of 2016.

The game won 2nd place in a small local contest.

The game is supposed to be played by two players on the same computer.

We patched the web version using Electron, so please don't be mad about blurry text.

Desktop builds have been tested on Linux-x64 and Windows-x64
If you have any problems, drop a comment.

All graphics, except flags, were made by us. Sounds were taken from freesound.org. Music is royality free.

Game was created by Wisdom Workshop.This is how we call us.

You can visit our website in which you will be able to:

  • Get to know us better
  • Read our blog for announcements and stuff
  • See other projects that are already created and will be created
https://wisdomworkshop.github.io/
